title: Code: Leviathan
original_name: コード・リヴァイアサン
sinopse:
Inariya-sensei says it is going to be a combination of fantasy and military-themed. Involves dragons and possibly time-travel. So far seems lighter than her usual, but still looks to ultimately be about love and war and how poorly they go together.

(Source: choutomaraseru@LJ)
